member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP
member.summary: Note This enumeration is supported by the Direct3D 11.1 runtime, which is available on Windows 8 and later operating systems.Specifies logical operations to configure for a render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_COPY_INVERTED
member.summary: Performs an inverted-copy of the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_NOOP
member.summary: No operation is performed on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_AND
member.summary: Performs a logical AND operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_NAND
member.summary: Performs a logical NAND operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_OR
member.summary: Performs a logical OR operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_NOR
member.summary: Performs a logical NOR operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_XOR
member.summary: Performs a logical XOR operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_EQUIV
member.summary: Performs a logical equal operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_AND_REVERSE
member.summary: Performs a logical AND and reverse operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_AND_INVERTED
member.summary: Performs a logical AND and invert operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_OR_REVERSE
member.summary: Performs a logical OR and reverse operation on the render target.

member.name: D3D11_LOGIC_OP.D3D11_LOGIC_OP_OR_INVERTED
member.summary: Performs a logical OR and invert operation on the render target.
